content.detailedDescription: I went outside from the garage last night - sky was very clear - i looked up expecting to see the moon and stars as usual on a beautiful night and was shocked to see 4 star-like objects in a beautiful red-orange color just hanging there in the sky in front and above me - i could not figure out what they were - i thought they might be some strange balloons that were lit up or something - i couldn not see the outline of the abjects because it was night and they were very bright - they were just hovering for about a minute.  they were spaced an exact distance apart from each other - they maintained that same spatial relationship as they started to glide across the sky coming from the northeast and going southwest in a sort of arc pattern-- one more set followed and then a single one came along - they disappeared into the sky as if someone had turned out the lights - there was no sound whatsoever and they glided rather than flew and always maintained the same space betwen them as they traveled - i ran inside and got a family member to see them because i could not believe my eyes and wanted proof that what i was seeing was real - i was very nervous viewing this because it was like nothing else i could imagine and i was almost afraid to continue looking - it felt like i was being viewed! it was mesmerizing - i did not have a camera and did not want to quit watching and go in the house to get one in case they disappeared before i got back.  it is an experience i will never forget!  i have not been able to find out if anyone else beside us saw the event.
content.summary: Total of 6 star-like objects moving across sky - from northwest to southeast-all evenly spaced-hovered sometimes

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving from wylie, tx to farmersville, tx heading north on hwy 78 around noon.  i was driving my suv and friend was in the passenger's seat.  i was about 3 miles from farmersville and i happened to glance to my left and noticed a white object in the sky.  it was not a plane or bird and i kept wondering what the heck it was.  it appeared and disappered a few times.  i kept asking my friend if she saw it and at first she said no.  i slowed down to about 10 miles an hour and while i was looking west she finally saw it appear north of us and then it was gone.

the object was a white skinny oval is the best i can describe it.
content.summary: Oval white shaped ufo spotted near farmersville, tx in broad daylight

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting on the back patio of my house the night of sat, april 26, 2008 talking with friends.  saw two really bright white lights cross the sky from south east to north west.  the lights were quite bright, brighter than any star or airplane lights and they traveled in a straight line one behind the other, separated by not too far, but further than if they were one thing.  they were bright enough, that i did not see them straight on at first, i actually saw the light reflecting if you will off the side of the house/windows on the second story, which made me look back and up at the sky.  there was no noise, they were low enough to be under the cloud cover that night, and they moved really fast, (saw them for maybe 4 seconds before they were here and gone).  there was no light trail behind the lights, and they all the sudden went out as opposed to disappearing on the horizon.
content.summary: Two bright lights crossing sky, one behind the other, in straight line

content.detailedDescription:
This is no joke. so let me start. back in 2007 in the last week of april on a wednesday at about 9:30pm i saw a ufo over antioch california it was a row of lights in a ���v��� formation. it flew vary slowly and was between 15 to 10 thousand feet hi but was defiantly on the horizon. since then i���ve tracked several unexplained things in the night sky. two bright light traveling east, glowing objects in orbit. but all were possible experimental aircraft, and being a sentence nerd/ good american, i would never report it. 
 
however, i could no longer hold it in any longer. it���s been seen allover the u.S. lately, and i am tired of it. this year on 01/01/2008 at 12:00am i was outside with my household,in antioch, friends and nabobs. where we saw the red/organ lights in the sky, at first i thought they were signal flairs because it was new years eve and it sounded like a war zone outside. they started in a start line and then moved there was about six of them they formed a fimular shape the big dipper. they started then to move in a vertical line one above the other. one went left and then came back now the row was not horizontal it was vertical. now the strange part they merged with each other yes six lights became one and then simply disappeared. while this was going on a privet plane was in the sky i wonder if they saw it to. thank god iam ont the only one who saw it.
content.summary: More than one kind

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv in my living room which has a large bay window facing the street.  a object with lights caught my eyes. it's really hard to say what made me notice.( because the lights weren't that bright( sometimes when cars turn the corner they might have their high beams on and it reflects on my living room and i automatically turn to see.  within 3 to 5 seconds the object caught my attention again and this time it was closer. i wouldn't swear to it but i kinda think it took a slight but deliberate turn towards my house (maybe because i had gotten up to look out the window). three to four seconds later it was coming towards my house.  now i could see the shape as it came closer. i was able to (only able ) to see the bottom and the outline (shape) . here goes!  for some reason it reminded me of a manta ray but rounded . this is why i am filing this report.   on the bottom of the object as it flew over , there were a total of five lighted bars in three rows. the first row = 1 horizontal white illuminated bar  -   the second row  = 3 vertical blue illuminated bars  -   the third row = 1 horizontal red illuminated bar.  as i am seeing this , i thought if i ever have to remember or want to remember this , i will never remember the proper sequence of colors  but i will remembers that there were 3 rows and their breakdown.   the only other thing i have to say is .  i am very familiar with planes (all kinds) helicopters etc.   oh and when if came over my house , if i had been on the roof  i would have been able to touch it or come really close to touching.  i scanned your data base hopeing i would discover what it was.   my feelings then and now  / were/are   nothing to be afraid of and those rows (i just remembered that the rows might have changed colors because i reread what i wrote above and i didn't include green) i hope this object is common and that i've just never seen it before.  this object was so close to my house , even with my tv on i should of heard or felt something and i did not.
content.summary: Low lights over neighbors houses caught my eye - looked away - but  a few seconds later - caught my eye again and it was closer than before

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were walking up our drive with the dogs. i'm hard pressed to put into i words what my son and i saw without being able to draw it but about six to eight weeks ago we saw two lights that described a repeated pattern and then vanished.  initially i didn't even see the lights, i'm 53 and my son is 16, they were so dim or distant. but as i looked at the part of the sky that my son directed me to it became very clear but still very dim as if you were looking at a distant star. as close as i can describe the incident it was as if one very dim light very high up and or far away would move in a semi-circular manner ahead of the other light and then the second one would catch up to it and then the first light would repeat the semi circular motion. if you were to hold your hand at arms length the circle described would have been no larger than the tip of your little finger or slightly smaller. they repeated this pattern at least a half dozen times in a very regular and exact manner.  i thought how extraordinary that we were witnessing this strange event and yet it didn't seem unreasonable in the sense that there are any number of satellites and i'm sure experimental vehicles that have a terrestrial origin.  and then something that really defied the norm ocurred.  the first light described the semi circle that it had been making but the second light did not come up to meet it.  both lights just paused in place and then after a few seconds, maybe 5 or 6, the first light went back to the second light and joined with it and they just sort of dimmed out and vanished.  i turned to my son and asked if he had seen the whole thing and he said he had and we agreed that we had witnessed something beyond our ability to explain.  i've lived on the northshore of kauai for over 25 years and i've seen and heard some very strange things but noting to match this.
i'd be interested in hearing if anybody has ever reported to have seen anything like what we saw.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two lights working in conjunction

content.detailedDescription:
It was at nite on the interstate highway,i saw a large egg shaped ufo following myself and family in our car,for 15 min until i told my friend mitchell to stop at the next rest stop off the highway,when we pulled over into the rest area,me and my family saw the white glowing egg shaped ufo fly closer to our car,it was just floating in place watching us,i told my friend mitchell to get back on the highway,as we were pulling out of the rest stop,the egg shaped ufo shot off into the nite sky in a flash,
it flew passed some clouds towards the stars in three sec)three months before in the summer of 2007 were had a close call in new mexico,near the white sands missle range,with red glowing ufo's at nite,i think we may be hunted by these things,why i wish i knew!
content.summary: White glowing large egg shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I've had two sightings -- 

it was the summer 1977 - i was in the 6th grade at the time and living in colorado springs. 

it was a beautiful day and i was out collecting pop bottles when for no reason i looked up. and about 1/2 mile up, i noticed there were (3) of them and looked like two nickels stacked on top of one another spinning with a red static glow around it., two were stationary and the other was moving around, like it was trying to position itself as if it was looking at something. 

moments later, all three objects shot straight up higher from my view - about another mile and hovered there for about 20-30 minutes. i just stood there mesmerized by it. then i started having this sinking fear feeling. then a man came up to me and asked me what i was looking at - i looked at him for just a moment and when i looked back up, the objects were even further up, then they suddenly vanished - like as if you turned off a light...Blink, they were gone. i never saw them again until i saw a show about the ufos that appeared over mexico city during an eclipse - i believe it was in 1993. they looked just like what i saw in '77 -- 16 years earlier.  it just blew me away! it was really cool seeing them again -- and caught on film.

that same summer, my class had an encounter with something while we were all at camp at camp shady brook. (i dont remember where that place is - somewhere west of the springs in the mountains) one night (around 11pm) there was a scientist there with a telescope and we were all looking at the rings of saturn, and it was my understanding from mrs, hall (my teacher) that this guy was from norad - and he was there to teach us some astronomy. when it was my turn to look at saturn, i noticed a light (fuzzy glow) off in the distance that was coming towards us and seemed very low -- no more than 50ft above the tops of the trees. it was moving very slow, and had no sound. i asked mrs, hall - "what is that?" she said it was a plane. i thought to myself that it was flying way too low to be a plane. as it got right on us (about 100 yards away) it stopped, and so did we -- it got very quite, even the crickets stopped chirping.

then the object suddenly made a 90������ turn and started going east. it was moving very slow (no sound) it looked like a fuzzy tennis ball - with a soft white glow with no details to it. moments later it started to move upwards at a 45������ angle. the it started speeding up, and then it took off like 300 miles an hour, then even faster like a shooting star at that same 45������ angle -- straight back up into the atmosphere.

i turned around to asked that guy (from norad) -- what just happened, what was that???  he was gone! he had raced down the hill back to his car and drove off -- leaving his telescope behind.

the weird part about all of this -- no one thought that anything unusual had just happened - of course, we were all only 6th graders.... what do we know. but i was very observant of the event. when we got back to the city - i couldn't understand why no one wanted to talk about it. i was bugging mrs, hall about it - so being the artist that i am, she told me to draw a picture of it -- so i did... i made a very detailed storyboard. the next day, some man showed up and asked me if he could have the drawing.... so i gave it to him. he explained to me that it was a helicopter, and that was the end of that.  mmmmm -- that was a very quite helicopter! the man took my drawing and left. mrs. hall told me to never talk about it again or i would be disciplined. so, i never gave it much thought after that - plus, as a 6th grader, i got distracted and moved on to something else anyway. but i never forgot about it, and its something i still think about to this day. 

i dont know why i feel compelled to talk about this now -- maybe because i think about it so much, i just have to share it and maybe someone else out there can relate.
content.summary: There were (3) and looked two nickels stacked on top of one another spinning with a red static glow around it.

content.detailedDescription: We saw a strange black rectangular-shaped object as we drove south down i5 around 2 pm sun 4/27. it looked like a hang-glider's canopy but larger. there was not connection present to anything underneath the shape.  my wife was able to observe it as we passed under and noted a metallic reflection from the sun and was not a balloon.  i observed the object was moving northwest (against prevailing winds as noted by ground winds, flora, etc) and the object was about 800 to 1000 feet in altitude.  it seemed to be moving at a speed about equal to the speed of our vehicle, about 80 mph.
content.summary: Shaped like a hanglider's parasail-but larger

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and family in our car traveling at night near the white sands base.
a red glowing ball about the size of our car,was flying about ten feet away,flashing white lights,burning our skin,chasing us,seem to be curious about us.When we tryed to drive faster the ufo seem to get upset and clone itself into two space ships,we turned our car around to head back towards the nearest town,one alien spaceship started to shoot a blue laser at our car,when we looked at the clock in our car,a hour had past in 15 mins to us.I will never forget that nite.There was three adults,one handicapped child and our pitbull in our car.
content.summary: Red balls of light space ships hunter droids

content.detailedDescription: So i was on my way to class at wcc and i was driving south bound on the taconic state parkway.  the taconic turns into the sprain parkway at one point and i was right in the area of the switch over so i'm not totally sure if i was still on the taconic or if it turned into the sprain at this point.  to confirm a more exact location i lost site of the object right where the bronx river parkway connects to the taconic/sprain south.  anyway, as i was driving down the parkway i saw a bright white light come up over the tree line along side of the parkway.  at first i thought it was a plane but after a minute or two it seemed as if it was hovering in one spot.  the ufo proceeded to come towards the highway at a fairly slow speed until it came to a point of being directly over my car.  as i slowed down and began to look up at the ufo as it was above me, i still only saw a bright white light and no details of any kind of craft.  the craft continued to fly across the parkway (i believe coming from the southeast and heading northwest) and went out of site over the adjacent tree line.  what i can't recall exactly is how big the object was but it was certainly bigger than a car.  it was also high enough that it was above the trees but it was not much higher than the trees. i also noted at the time that there was no sound coming from the ufo like you would hear from a plane flying so closely overhead.  to add a twist to my experience, as the ufo began to leave my site my cell phone began to ring and it was my now ex - girlfriend.  the first thing i said to her was "i think i just saw a ufo" and she answered right back to me "was it a big bright white light?"  i replied to her "yes how did you know that?" and she proceeded to tell me how she just saw the same thing fly over the bronx river parkway.  unfortunately i was unable to pull over to take a better look because there were enough cars coming off of the bronx river ramp and it's a fairly dangerous intersection.  i could also kick myself because i had my digital camera in the car with me but was so amazed by what i was seeing that it didn't occur to me.
content.summary: Bright white oval light passes directly overhead of my car on taconic parkway

content.detailedDescription: Has i was awakening  at the date metioned sleeping on a friends porch lol not drunken or in the effects of anything  iam a naturalist  vegies and fruits ,,,iwas awaken buy a friend when he was going to work 5 to 10 minutes later a got up from my deep sleep then started walking to the main gates of this expensive private ubanization in fajado puerto rico and looked up like i always do to see if its raining  plus i do love to see the stars ,,wow what a display a giant aircraft i thought mmm strangeso close but no sounds weired i was statled.. it stood there like  watching me,, manny light like in a v patern but the space craft or say ufo was triangular from 6 to 8 light on each side in a v shape patern.Yes i was scared because i was sleeping god what did this thing do to me while sleeping then i was scared even more but i was monentarily scared , didnt last long i took a deep breath and my health was ok so i didnt even say nothing to no one because i still was grieeving my recently wife death to  cancer so i smiled inside with a positive feeling that what ever it was couldent be bad for my health so i kept  this infomation about my life well quiet... nbody would believe me anyhow... i just want to know what are the side effects if i was tested or used by whatever hovered over my head that early morning night ...I have a tingleing in my left upper leg and my stomach  i just wondered of side effects ,, the tinggling feel like we put a cell phone to vibrate or lol is it that the cell phone  is whats producing it .. take care lov always nino i will send a good drawing later ok tell me if this   possible ?
content.summary: Sleeping in the porch , then awkening  at 5am saw the tringle with lights hovering so close so big

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 2007, we were traveling through new mexico toward los angeles, california, when we took a wrong turn down interstate 25 between alburque new mexico and el paso, texas. this is my story.
content.summary: Flashing small sphere strobe effect taking pictures of our car near white sands missle range

content.detailedDescription: I went outside and laid down in the grass in front of my apartment. i looked up in the sky and noticed this very small object that was silver in color with a streamer hanging down that was silver as well following to the rear and port side of this jet that looked as if it had just taken off from love field (7 to 10 miles away) matching the jet's speed and ascent. from my perspective it looked about like a balloon but i haven't seen one move that fast or be that close to a passenger jet. the distance between the two were (guessing) 500 yards. i could tell that the object was lower than the jet slightly and not above it. it definitely looked like it was pacing the jet. i watched it pass overhead and decided to go get a pair of binoculars, but i knew it would be gone as fast as i could retreive them and it was. i peered into the sky with the binos and only saw the jet as it was miles away by then. if anyone else saw this or if it is explainable i would like to know. if i am not alone in this viewing i would be glad to throw my name in the hat. feel free to contact me.
content.summary: Ufo followed jet take off from love field

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2:30 am me and my friend were sitting on our roof sky watching, because of the night before we had the big bang and i witnessed the  orange balls of lights and knew immediately it was a ufo. soon enough we witnessed things we had never seen before. at one point in the night i was scared for my life. these things were floating about 1 mile away from us. all we could see were the lights but this picture lit up enough to see the actual objects! we saw at least 15 ufo's that night and they were blatantly not  aircrafts of this world. we stayed on my roof until the sun came out and they were still out. my camera soon died after this picture, but i thought it was good enough evidence to throw off anyone who did not believe in these things.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.shape: Blimp,  Circle,  Disc,  Oval,  Sphere,  Triangle
content.summary: I was on my roof they were blinking but in this picture they showed up.

content.detailedDescription:
It was just getting dark out and i was on my porch having a smoke when i noticed a large red light flying below the air traffic from seattle and seatac. as i watched it going from south to north it all of a sudden took a sharpe angle turn towards the east(seattle)the strange thing was the size of the red light it was so much larger the the airplanes light that i see everyday, and being near the airports i see planes of all sizes(even military).
 i was watching ufo hunters and the object i saw sounds exactly the same as those in stevensville texas that i read about the next morning.Then in feb i saw a very simillar object that was just hovering and was a very huge bright red light that didn't move for atleast 10 minutes then all of a sudden the object moved up to the left then flashed a very bright white light then vanished..

 i just been wondering if anyone else in the seattle bremerton area has seen the same objects i saw in january and febuary... they were so noticable i don't know how anyone out couldn't of noticed..If i can get feedback it would be great, because we're not alone and i don't fear the truth!

thank you


tim
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Standing on my front porch when i saw the object

content.detailedDescription:
I live in cortlandt manor, ny in a condo complex. the location is about 5 minutes from putnam valley by car,  and i recently found out, about 10 minutes by car from the double stone chamber on lake oscawana rd.

in the summer of 1989, i went out to walk my dog at night. it was between 10-11pm.  as i stepped outside of my door i saw this huge craft in the sky, flying low just above the treetops. it was lit up across the bottom perimeter (white lights), practically soundless..A low hum. it was too dark to make out its actual shape, accept that the lights were going around the front. 

i looked to my left and right, and there were 6 of my neighbors watching it too. we stood there fascinated until it passed over and was out of our sight. it must have taken about 15 minutes. after talking to my neighbors right afterwards, i don't recall anyone mentioning that they were afraid.

when i went into my home, i tried the police station and the line was continuously busy. i decided to not follow-up the following day.

my youngest son wasn't born at the time, and when he was 7 years old he came home from playing with my next door neighbor's son. he asked my why i never told him that i saw a ufo, because his friend's dad told his friend about it.

i must add, my neighbors no longer live here and i have no idea where they are now.
content.summary: I live in the lower hudson valley of ny, and in the summer of 1989, i sighted a huge ufo. i saw it with neighbors.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside for a smoke right after some pretty good rain showers here in state collete, pa.  it was still raining some and i was looking at the cool cloud formations.  i was looking towards the south (towards down town state college) when i saw a set of shapes, at first looked like a triangular formation of geese flying inside the clouds.  i watched them fly towards the down town area and did not think too much of it since we do see geese flying around here.  i did think it was strange that they were flying in the rain so i kept watching them.  again, nothing strange, maybe they do fly in the rain.  they were moving pretty slow inside the clouds and in a very straight triangle shape with one of the points leading the rest of the shapes.  there were about 15 shapes in the triangle, all whiter than the surrounding clouds and all moving perfectly in sync.  i did not see moving wings or irregular flying as is ussually the case with birds commonly seen in this area.  after about 5 minutes of watching them move closer to town, i saw something not common with birds flying in formation.  

the triangle stopped in mid air and spun 180 degrees and started flying exactly the same route in the opposite direction heading north.  the same point of the triangle was again in the front of the formation. that's when i thought there was something very uncommon with that experience.  i've never seen any birds do that, stop in mid air and rotate their formation in its center axis to head back in the opposite direction.  i'm no bird expert, but that looked strange.  i kept watching the objects heading north and when overhead, i did not see any wing movement or irregular flying, but the objects now looked more like part of a larger object which was of the same color as the clouds, with these whiter spheres (which is what i thought were birds) underneath.  i heard no sounds of birds like is ussually the case with geese, and no airplane sounds either.  i lost sight of the object(s) after several minutes of them heading north, north west towards toftrees.

i watched for objects or birds or anything for another hour after this, but did not see anything else so i went to bed.
content.summary: Several white spheres in triangle formation moving inside rain clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving to go to the convenience store with my friend, t. he was driving. i pointed up to the sky, "hey t. look, it looks like a flying saucer over there..." over the treetops. he agreed. we stopped at convenience store and he went in. while he was there, i looked acroos the tree through a samll grove a trees and saw several fireball like lights apparently blinking, growing large and smaller, coming closer and getting smalloer as the moved backwards, apparently floating around like fish in an aquarium, pulsating blue, purple, pink, red. not much yellow or gree colors. then t. came back to the car and i pointed them out. he agreed that they certainly did look strange. then we drove up around the corned and went through the drive through atm at the credit union so i could get some cash. then we drove south a few blocks, mad a short series turns, right, left, right--and drove a few more blocks. 

just when we were to turn left to go to my apartment off of culebra road, i looked up in the sky where i had seen the craft before. i said "look t. is the flying saucer again...Turn right!" no...I gotta get back" i argued, "t...Turn this gd car right right now!!!" (usually we drove my car, but this time we were in my friend ts car, a small white chevy,  so it was strange that i was demanding where we should go)we drove about 1 block north toward a large radio antennae....Look! we saw several elliptical disc-shaped apparent crafts, just the lights but no actual metal bodies. the lights pulsated left-right-left-right..., colored pink, red, purple, blue, pink (i saw no bright  orange or yellowish colors and no bright lime greens) i have an art degree, and good at drawing and painting, so i noticed this...The "ships" floated around, first i saw 2-3, then number increased to 6-7.....They changed forms from ether /fireballs to the long elliptical/disc shaped crafts....And then back again.... they soundlessly moved precisely like fish in an aquarium- up and down, left to right and back again, backwards-forwards and back again. their altitude was about as high as a 8-10 story building and fluctuating higheer and lower. at one point, one did descend to the groand and then back up again to the original height of an 8 story building.  the length of all the crafts together was 1/2 mile or so. fluctuated between the craft-like shape and the bright, glowing, ehter balls pulsating those red-blue-pink-purple colors.

 after about 90 seconds or two minutes or so of this, they all reverted to one large fireball---it lifted in the sky to the northwest---over the ingram mall. it moved very quickly and moved with no sound at anytime. t. and i were speechless and dumbfounded, he said he had to get back to my apartment as he was expecting a call. i was afraid to report the sightings...But then i read about the sightings in stephensville in january or february 2007. my sighting seems related. the things i saw moved in the direction of the texas hill country, where stephensivlle is located. 

what me and t saw, was over a large vacant area of land, near the radio tower, just about 1 mile south of ingram mall. i wondered why nobody else in the area seemed to report this or see it. i heard about nothing like it until stephensville report.  the objects i saw were nothing like the many different types of aircraft i see flying around s. san antonio regularly.
  we had a friend in the back seat of the car. i yelled at him repeatedly to look but he refused because he was sleeping. i was sitting in the passenger side of the front seat throught these incidents. there was a ceiling of gray clouds that evening, but it was very high and far away, perhaps 3-4 miles from the ground.
content.shape: Circle,  Disc,  Fireball,  Oval,  Sphere,  Star-like
content.summary: Disc-like shaped lights;  dlowing ether balls soundless, shape-changing, travels very swiftly

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sunbathing about 5pm i got up and went to get a drink of water when a passenger plane passed overhead i looked up and couldnt take my eyes off this object that was hovering above the plane as if to let it pass / im sure the pilot must have seen it// i went into my house and got my camcorder and asked my wife if it was still about/ she pointed to where it was flying and i got some good but shaky footage of the disc shaped object i put it on my tv and took some pictures of it and iwas quite surprised to see it was not a plane /i have shown some pictures to friends and they cant believe what they see  /i followed the craft into a cloud and thought it would come out at a certain place but it went to the right as i can see on my tv but when you look into the camcorder all you can see is black and white  so when it went into the cloud i couldnt focus on it and lost it iwas looking in the direction i thought it would go but it went the other way
content.summary: Hovered at first then moved on

content.detailedDescription:
The above grid asked for specific info about "one" event.  i'd actually like to discuss two that might be related.

i can't say the objects i've seen were "other-worldly" in nature, but they were certainly strange.  i've witnessed both flying in the same area from my backyard over the last couple of months.  details below...

a couple of months back i was sitting in my backyard late at night.  something bright and fast (i mean, really fast) moving at a high altitude caught my eye.  it was a bright dot that moved across the sky.  way too fast for a satellite.  could have been a meteor, but i've never seen one last so long, and with no trail whatsoever.  plus, i'd swear it's movement was somehow erratic.  a perfectly straight line yes, but not one hundred percent smooth in its "motion".  i'm not a trained observer, but i've seen my share of meteors.  i really don't think this was one of them.  it went from one end of the sky all the way to the other before disappearing over the horizon.  a very long distance.  it accomplished this in about two, maybe two and a half seconds.  although i found the sight fascinating, i didn't put too much stock into it.  then a week or so ago, again sitting in my backyard late at night, i saw a similar object flying in the same area, and in the same direction.  this time, however, it was much lower.  it moved about the speed of a plane.  in fact, i figured it was just that as we live close to the burbank airport, but it's path did not match what usually flies in/out of the area.  too high and going the wrong way.  what was most curious about the object was that it had no blinking lights or headlights and it made no sound whatsoever.  we've become very familiar with planes in our six months living in this house, and they all have had the usual lights/sounds.  we see a lot of helicopters too.  definetely wasn't that.  i kept an eye on the object for about 30-45 seconds and then, very suddenly, it was gone.  just gone.  it didn't blink out.  it simply stopped "being there".  not sure i can completely describe it, but if it were a plane, i've never heard one that silent, or seen one with no federally required hazard lights/headlights, nor have i seen one turn all its lights out in the dark in a heavilly frequented air traffic zone.  it was there, and then it wasn't.  

could be nothing, but i don't often seen strange things in the sky.  now, in the span of about a month or two, i've seen two.  both in the same spot in the sky (though at different altitudes), and both heading the same way.  east, over the mountains above old town burbank.  i've never reported anything like this before, and i don't know how credible you might find it, but i figured i would just suggest you guys keep an eye out for other reported sightings in the burbank/san fernando valley area.  weird stuff.

thank you.
content.summary: Object flew at alt. equivalent of plane, but had no signal lights and made no noise.  disappeared in front of my eyes.  no explanation.

content.detailedDescription: I have been staying up late evry night waiting to see if it would come back or not since the last time i saw it back in march. earlier this evening at 8:00pm 10:23pm i was out side on the porch with my daughter and periodically i would go and check if it was there or not it wasn't so after the mosquitos came out we went inside and i put my daughter to bed. well at 11:35ish my neibors daughter and her friend was back out side being really loud so i went back out side to tell them to keep it down and i went to the end of the porch to check and it was back. i stayed out there watching it till 12:20 pm the mosquitos were eating my feet up so i came inside to report it this time it is approximately in the same place but i would say if i put a measuring tape up towards the sky it would measure about an inch and a half(1.5") over to the right. from were it was the last time i saw it. but this time it is triple the size it was last time so i am assuming that means it is closer.
content.summary: It's back!

content.detailedDescription:
Setting:  sunny clear day. minimal cloud coverage
home: sits on hill overlooking a river valley. no obstructions, great vies.
time: 3:00 - 4:00pm?
date: 


sitting at our kitchen table were my 4 nephews. ages 14, 12, 11, 8? when one says "hey what is that out the window?", "wait, its now gone". about 5minutes later he said it again, "hey check that out, what is that?".  we all looked out the window and in broad daylight there it was, something i or any of us have never seen.  a silver (keg shaped) object hovering motionless 3/4 up from the horizon. we all scrambled away from the table and out onto the deck.  lots of confusion and questions from the kids saying, "uncle,xxx what is that?". we watched the object for about two minutes. i went in to grab my 12x optical zoom cam-corder and when i came out and got it ready to shoot the object just disappeared.  it literaly just vanished. this object was seen by 5 people and all recollect the account and visual the same. we were all confused by what we had seen and i was in complete astonishment. i've watched the ufo type shows and always felt it possible, but after witnessing a ufo first hand, i'm no longer a skeptic. it boggles my mind to understand this and image has been burned into my mind forever.
content.summary: Hovering round ufo sighted near belle plaine, mn during day.

content.detailedDescription: i was working inside of a newly purchased house.  it got to be about 9 oclock and my brother was ready to head back to his home.  i walked him outside and we were standing around talking before he left.  it was myself(32), my brother(28), my stepson(5),and two nephews(18)(10). after about 10 minutes my step son asked, "what is that?" we all looked up and there it was.  at first it looked like two crystal clear bright white lights but it kind of turned to the right a little and you could see it was a shiny tube shape connecting the two lights.  what ever it was was totally silent, id estimate about 30' to 50' feet long, and maybe 10' wide. it flew over the house maybe 3 to 5 hundered feet high, and wasnt moving that fast.  we were all watching it and after it flew past it must have speeded up or cut the lights off, because it was tottaly out of sight.  we were all freakin out about it so i grabbed somepaper and myself, my brother , and my nephew all sketched a quick drawing separtly to see if they matched. we did this because we couldnt believe what we just seen.  all three drawings were very close to matching.  i dont know what it was but it wasn't an airplane, helicopter, baloon, or meteors.  it was no question flighing and had no wings.  the one thing that i will never forget is how clean the light was, i mean it was almost like a white object glowing under a black light.
content.summary: Something flew overhead with two bright lights at each end of a cigar shaped object

content.detailedDescription: The evening of april 23, 2008 i was out walking my dog when suddenly appeared three star-like amber lights over the horizon facing north. each light was in some type of formation and they slowly ascended then increased speed. i watched this for over thirty minutes. the first light quickly approached the south in which i was positioned and flew directly overhead. i could make out now 1 red and 2 white blinking lights with a "v" shaped body and sounded like a low hum. each of the three "crafts/lights" flew in the same heading totally identical in description. what was so unusual about this incident was the fact that i live in residential neighborhood, and air traffic never travels from north to south that late at night. also, they were travelling way to low to the ground to be typical commercial airliners. after that, i lost sight of them. while this was happening, i had an eerie feeling come over me like i was being threatened or something. it's like those lights were intentionally meant for me. i wasn't really afraid, i just wanted to know what the hell they were. my neighbor and i both witnessed these strange lights.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three bright pulsating amber lights in formation ascending in the north to travel towards the south at approx. 200-500mph

content.detailedDescription: Looking at eastern sky, very high up ,watched two points of light, one appeared to be the front of the object and the other the rear. these points of light stayed at the same distance from each other which was several miles apart and both moved at the same speed.  traveled at a very high altitude. if these were two planes then they were traveling the exact same heading and at the exact same speed. never seen 2 planes do that at that altitude that close together. lights moved from north to south in perfect straight line to each other.
content.summary: Possible cigar shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: Testing cms
content.summary: Testing cms

content.detailedDescription: We had the video camera set up to film all night and when we got to sleep in our hotel room it appeared in front of our camera and video itself while turning the camera off and it makes a weird sound when it comes in front of the camera .We were at the cassadaga hotel room #25 in cassadaga,florida .It looks like the chest of a grey to us.It has a little  shiny dot thing it looks like on its chest it is turning off our camera.We were sleeping and when i woke up the next morning i turned the camera off and unplugged it . when all three of us got up to go to the restroom during the night it is not on the camera and when i went back to bed after restroom visit i checked the camera and it was still on and filming .And when i got up in the morning it was still on .So we have lost time also .I have made a vhs tape of it but i will need a address to send it to so u can see it .The tape is about 48 mins long and it is on the last 10 seconds .The tape should be of the whole night.We were like wow what happened just now .I viewed it alone so i seen it and it scared me i almost dropped my camera .Its not like it walks into the frame of the camera it just appears with a sound .I am scared because i dont know what it is .And i have 2 long marks on my upper thighs 1 on each thigh i have not been able to sleep well at all since i seen this on my camera i have showed it to everyone and some think it is a grey and some are just saying wow i dont know what it is but it is sure weird looking .I am worried all the time like i am not ever going to be alone now .If you can help me find out what itis so i can rest again i would be happy.I am not good at writing (as you can tell)letters .Thank you.Sylvia johnson,virgina christensen and mary walsh. we are still in the state of florida visiting
content.summary: It comes on our video camera and turns it off
